comment: The projective subspace closure of a set equals the union of the closures of its finite subsets. Analogous to Lemma 3.3.6 of [PtakPulmannova] p. 72. Compare the closed subspace version ~ pclfinclN . (Contributed by NM, 10-Sep-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
